main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified objects reported in Mira Loma, California, during July 1955.
interesting points: Witnesses reported bright objects that appeared suddenly and moved quickly before fading out., Objects described included shapes like semi-circles and changing colors., One sighting lasted about 45 seconds with a size comparison to a silver dollar., The reliability of the witnesses was evaluated to be good due to military training backgrounds., Weather conditions at the time may have contributed to visual phenomena being mistaken for UFOs.
sighted object: One or multiple unidentified bright objects
witness description: Ground observers and local civilian witnesses
